Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Houston in 1981...
Injured on 8/14/1983 with a Broken Ankle, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1986, off Jimmy Key (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1986, off Dave Righetti (ATL)...
Traded from Houston to Chicago (N) on 4/18/1986 (Going to HOU: LF D. Justice, C M. Salas. Going to CHC: C M. Tettleton, CF L. Dykstra, 2B W. Backman, P D. Rozema)...
Injured on 7/12/1986 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/15/1988 with a Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1988, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
